wikipedia_page.main:
Moira Foot (born in Northampton) is an English actress.  She starred in 'Allo 'Allo!,. playing Denise Laroque, the leader of the local communist resistance.  She also played Miss Thorpe, Mr. Rumbold's temporary secretary, in three episodes of Are You Being Served?.  Other series in which she appeared include Hark at Barker, Six Dates with Barker, His Lordship Entertains, On the Buses, Oh Happy Band!, Maggie and Her, Doctor at Large, Quiller, and The Benny Hill Show. In 1977 she appeared in the episode Angels of Death in The New Avengers. Her film credits include roles in One Brief Summer (1970), On the Buses (1971), and The Strange Case of the End of Civilization as We Know It (1977).
Moira Foot is the daughter of Alistair Foot, co-writer (with Anthony Marriott) of the long-running farce No Sex Please, We're British.

link_mentions.page: List of Are You Being Served? characters
response: Moira Foot played Miss Thorpe, who appeared as Mr Rumbold's new but temporary secretary in the episodes 'German Week', 'Shoulder to Shoulder' and 'New Look'. Her good looks attracted the attentions of Captain Peacock and even Young Mr Grace.  Moira Foot later played Denise Laroque in 'Allo 'Allo which was also created by Jeremy Lloyd and David Croft.

link_mentions.page: The Strange Case of the End of Civilization as We Know It

response: Mrs Askey (Hattie Jacques), a very possessive mother, calls Michael Upton out at all hours to look at her daughter (Moira Foot). Mr Askey (Michael Godfrey) is not amused...
